token_info.name: Paradox Hat Deduction
token_info.description: This is the result of a "daily" challenge from 2013. Starting from 3 random words the task was to create a piece in a few hours. The 3 words in this challenge were "Paradox Hat Deduction". This is a riff on the "Monty Hall Problem" which visualizes and simulates the paradox phenomenon that switching your choice is making you more likely to win. | Artist: Mario Klingemann / @Quasimondo | Original creation date: September 26th 2013
